election.business.interfaces

Interface Ballot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Ballot>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StubBallot

    public interface Ballot
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Ballot>
    Defines an election ballot.
    Author:
    Jaya, Maja

    • Method Detail

      • cast

        void cast(Voter voter)
        Ballot can be cast by a voter. The voter parameter is required since eventually we need to verify that the voter is not fraudulent (i.e., not eligible to vote, or has already voted.
        Parameters:
        voter -

      • getBallotItems

        BallotItem[] getBallotItems()
        Returns a deep copy of the BallotItems that make up the Ballot. Used to Tally the vote.
        Returns:
        array of BallotItems

      • getElection

        Election getElection()
        Returns the Election that is associated with teh Ballot
        Returns:
        election

      • selectBallotItem

        void selectBallotItem(int position,
                      int value)
        Sets a BallotItem's value.
        Parameters:
        position - The 0-indexed position of the ballot choice
        value - The value to set

      • validateSelections

        boolean validateSelections()
        Validates in the BallotItems selected are valid
        Returns:
        true if the Ballot is valaid and ready to cast
